section.title: Add a New Framework
section.p:
To add a new framework to your , follow these steps:
Go to your Administration Page.
Select Frameworks.
Click Upload Framework and choose a framework file to upload.
Click OK to upload the file. The framework should appear in the list on this page.
Once you are finished with all of your changes, restart the server.

section.title: Delete a Framework
section.p:
To delete a framework from your , follow these steps:
Go to your Administration Page.
Select Frameworks.
Find the framework you want to delete and click the Schedule for deletion button on the right side of its name.
Restart the server to apply the changes.
